data.message:
When Is Em's 9th studio Album realeasing. .
I am one of Em's greatest fans......
I am waiting from past 1 and half year cause rumours spread typically 
last year.......
And remeber Shady's Campaign Speech
And the quotes 'Don't worry I'm working on an album,
Here's something meanwhile'
It was a year ago...
M impaitainly waiting can't wait no more. .....
Why is Marshall Sir taking so much time....
I hope he shall notify us soon. ..
At least the release date....
So I can prepare myself up as per that....
'Love Him like my daddy....'
